TypeSignature.Value: public interface ContentControl : IDisposable, Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContentControlBase, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public interface auto ansi abstract ContentControl implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ContentControlBase, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 表示文档中的内容控件。

span.span: Represents a content control a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象是可变的控件，它可以表示任何可以使用 Microsoft Office Word 中的内容控件的八个类型。A object is a mutable control that can represent any of the eight types of content controls that you can use in Microsoft Office Word. 例如，如果你创建最初具有纯文本控件的功能，你可以更改它在运行时，以便其行为类似于组合框。For example, if you create a that initially has the functionality of a plain text control, you can change it at run time so that it behaves like a combo box. 其他内容控件不能在这种方式。Other content controls cannot be used in this way. 例如，只能表示多信息文本控件。For example, a can only represent a rich text control. 有关内容控件的详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)。For more information about content controls, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md). 若要创建，使用之一方法。To create a , use one of the methods. 无法添加在设计时向文档。You cannot add a to a document at design time. 当你创建，你必须指定你想要创建的内容控件的类型，也可以基于现有的内容控件上的新控件。When you create a , you must specify the type of the content control that you want to create, or you can base the new control on an existing content control. 在创建后，你可以更改它表示使用的内容控件的类型属性。After you create a , you can change the type of content control that it represents by using the property. 某些成员将引发异常，如果该控件设置为一种不应使用这些成员的控件时，会使用它们。Some members will throw an exception if you use them while the control is set to a type of control that is not intended to use the member. 例如，属性将引发异常，如果你尝试使用在不表示日期选取器。For example, the property will throw an exception if you try to use it on a that does not represent a date picker. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 当前实例的 。

span.span: Gets a that represents the current instance of Microsoft Office Word.

value.span: Microsoft Office Word 的当前实例。

span.span: The current instance of Microsoft Office Word.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开有关 Word，应用于该实例的选项的当前实例的信息以及在实例中打开当前文档。The property exposes information about the current instance of Word, the options applied to that instance, and the current documents open within the instance.

summary.span: 获取或设置在表示生成块库的 中显示的生成块的类别。

span.span: Gets or sets the category of building blocks that are displayed in a that represents a building block gallery.

value.span: 在 中显示的生成块的类别。

span.span: The category of the building blocks that are displayed in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应仅当使用属性具有值`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlBuildingBlockGallery`。This property is intended to be used only if the property of the has the value `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlBuildingBlockGallery`. 否则，此属性没有任何影响。Otherwise, this property does nothing. 所有构建基块都所属的类别和一个库。All building blocks belong to a category and a gallery. 使用属性指定的构建基块，显示的类别。Use the property to specify the category of the building blocks that are displayed by the . 你可以设置到此属性的值`Built-In`或`General`类别定义的 Microsoft Office Word 中，也可以指定自定义的类别。You can set the value of this property to the `Built-In` or `General` categories defined by Microsoft Office Word, or you can specify a custom category. 若要指定的库中显示的构建基块，使用属性。To specify which gallery of building blocks to display in the , use the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置在表示生成块库的 中显示的生成块的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the building blocks that are displayed in a that represents a building block gallery.

value.span: 在控件中显示的生成块的类别。

span.span: The type of the building blocks that are displayed in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应仅当使用属性具有值`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlBuildingBlockGallery`。This property is intended to be used only if the property of the has the value `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlBuildingBlockGallery`. 否则，此属性没有任何影响。Otherwise, this property does nothing. 所有构建基块都属于库和一个类别。All building blocks belong to a gallery and a category. 使用属性来指定哪些库中显示的构建基块。Use the property to specify which gallery of building blocks to display in the . A只能显示某些库的构建基块。A can display only certain galleries of building blocks. 属性可以设置只为以下`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBuildingBlockTypes`值：The property can be set only to the following `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBuildingBlockTypes` values: - `wdTypeAutoText` - `wdTypeCustom1` - `wdTypeCustom2` - `wdTypeCustom3` - `wdTypeCustom4` - `wdTypeCustom5` - `wdTypeCustomAutoText` - `wdTypeCustomEquations` - `wdTypeCustomQuickParts` - `wdTypeCustomTables` - `wdTypeEquations` - `wdTypeQuickParts` - `wdTypeTables` 指定的构建基块显示的类别，使用属性。To specify the category of building blocks that are displayed by the , use the property.

exception.span: 属性设置为 Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBuildingBlockTypes 值，该值标识无法在 中显示的构造块的类别。

span.span: The property is set to a Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBuildingBlockTypes value that identifies a category of building blocks that cannot be displayed in a .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 （代表复选框控件）已选中还是未选中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a that represents a check box control is checked or unchecked.

value.span: 如果已选中该内容控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the content control is checked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，仅当表示复选框内容控件。This property can be used only if the represents a check box content control. > [!NOTE] > 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.

exception.span: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

span.span: This property is used in a Word 2007 project.
The property does not have the value Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlCheckBox.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Copy() cil managed

summary.span: 将 从文档复制到剪贴板。

span.span: Copies the from the document to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用方法时，原始保留在文档。When you use the method, the original remains on the document. 一份（包括所有文本和属性设置) 将添加到剪贴板。A copy of the , including all text and property settings, is added to the Clipboard.

summary.span: 获取一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建 的应用程序。

span.span: Gets a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the was created.

value.span: 一个 32 位整数，该整数指示已在其中创建该控件的应用程序。

span.span: A 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the control was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建属性返回表示字符串的十六进制数 4d535744， `MSWD`。If the was created in Microsoft Office Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string `MSWD`. 此字符串是 Word 的四个字符创建者代码。This string is the four-character creator code for Word.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cut() cil managed

summary.span: 从文档中移除 ，然后将其添加到剪贴板中。

span.span: Removes the from the document and adds it to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用方法时，原始从文档中移除。When you use the method, the original is removed from the document. 一份（包括所有文本和属性设置) 将添加到剪贴板。A copy of the , including all text and property settings, is added to the Clipboard.

summary.span: 获取或设置在表示日期选择器的 中显示的日历的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of calendar that is displayed in a that represents a date picker.

value.span: 在控件中显示的日历的类型。

span.span: The type of calendar that is displayed in the control.

value.span: 默认值取决于操作系统的当前区域设置。

span.span: The default depends on the current locale setting of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，仅当表示日期选取器。This property can be used only if the represents a date picker. 默认日历类型取决于操作系统的区域设置。The default calendar type depends on the locale setting of the operating system. 例如，英语 （美国） 的区域设置的默认日历类型是`wdCalendarWestern`。For example, the default calendar type for the locale English (United States) is `wdCalendarWestern`.

span.span: The property does not have the value Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlDate.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串指定在表示日期选择器的 中显示日期的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the format of dates that are displayed in a that represents a date picker.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串指定 显示日期所用的格式。

span.span: A string that specifies the format in which the displays dates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，仅当表示日期选取器。This property can be used only if the represents a date picker. 默认日期格式为 Microsoft Office Word 中，这通常取决于操作系统的区域设置中指定的格式设置。The default date format is the format setting specified in Microsoft Office Word, which usually depends on the locale setting of the operating system. 例如，英语 （美国） 的区域设置的日期的默认格式是`mm/dd/yyyy`。For example, the default format of dates for the locale English (United States) is `mm/dd/yyyy`.

span.span: The property does not have the value Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlDate.

summary.span: 获取或设置在表示日期选择器的 中显示的日期的语言格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the language format of the date that is displayed in a that represents a date picker.

value.span: 在控件中显示的日期的语言格式。

span.span: The language format of the date that is displayed in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，仅当表示日期选取器。This property can be used only if the represents a date picker. 默认值属性依赖于 Microsoft Office Word 中指定的编辑语言。The default value of the property depends on the editing language specified in Microsoft Office Word. 例如，英语 （美国） 的默认语言格式是`wdEnglishUS`。For example, the default language format for English (United States) is `wdEnglishUS`.

span.span: The property does not have the value Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlDate.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个格式，（表示日期选取器）以此格式将数据保存到自定义 XML 部件中。

span.span: Gets or sets the format in which dates are saved in a custom XML part by a that represents a date picker.

value.span: 数据保存到自定义 XML 部件中的格式。

span.span: The format in which dates are saved in a custom XML part.

value.span: 默认值是值。

span.span: The default is wdContentControlDateStorageDateTime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，仅当表示日期选取器。This property can be used only if the represents a date picker. 如果绑定到*自定义 XML 部件*在文档中，属性指定控件如何以 xml 格式保存日期。If the is bound to a *custom XML part* in the document, the property specifies how the control saves dates in XML. 您可以保留为 XML 架构日期的日期 (`xsd:date`)，XML 架构日期/时间 (`xsd:dateTime`)，或为文本。You can persist dates as an XML schema date (`xsd:date`), an XML schema date/time (`xsd:dateTime`), or as text. 有关内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件的详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md)。For more information about binding content controls to custom XML parts, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md).

span.span: The property does not have the value Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlDate.

summary.span: 获取用于设置 中的文本格式的字符样式的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the character style that is used to format text in the .

value.span: 用于设置 中的文本格式的字符样式的名称。

span.span: The name of the character style to use to format text in the .

value.span: 默认值是**默认段落字体**。

span.span: The default is **Default Paragraph Font**.

summary.span: 获取由表示下拉列表或组合框的 所显示的项的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of items that are displayed by a that represents a drop-down list or a combo box.

value.span: 所显示的项。

span.span: The items that are displayed by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，仅当表示下拉列表或组合框。This property can be used only if the represents a drop-down list or a combo box. 当你创建表示下拉列表或组合框，默认情况下不包含任何项。When you create a that represents a drop-down list or a combo box, it contains no items by default. 若要添加项，请使用`Add`方法属性。To add items, use the `Add` method of the property.

span.span: The property does not have the value Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlComboBox or Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlDropdownList.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可从文档删除 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the can be deleted from the document.

value.span: 如果可从文档删除 ，则为 ；如果不能删除此控件，则为 。

span.span: if the cannot be deleted from the document; if the control can be deleted.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要阻止用户编辑的内容，使用属性。To prevent users from editing the contents of a , use the property. 有关如何使用若要保护的文档的一部分，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[如何： 使用内容控件保护文档的某些部分](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md)。For more information about how to use a to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md).

exception.span: 属性为 时，设置此属性。

span.span: This property is set when the property is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示能否编辑 的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the contents of the can be edited.

value.span: 如果不能编辑 的内容，则为 ；如果可以编辑控件内容，则为 。

span.span: if the contents of the cannot be edited; if the contents of the control can be edited.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要阻止用户删除从文档中，使用属性。To prevent users from deleting a from the document, use the property. 有关使用若要保护的文档的一部分，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[如何： 使用内容控件保护文档的某些部分](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md)。For more information about using a to protect a part of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 是否可以包含换行符。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the can contain line breaks.

value.span: 如果 可以包含换行符，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the can contain line breaks; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

summary.span: 获取 的父级。

span.span: Gets the parent of the .

value.span: 一个对象，表示 的父级。

span.span: An object that represents the parent of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 父级是控件所在的对象。The parent of the is the object in which the control is contained. 例如，如果控件在文档的正文，则此属性将返回对象。For example, if the control is in the body of the document, this property will return a object. 要获取其父类的中包含或，使用属性。To get the parent of a that is contained in a or a , use the property.

summary.span: 获取嵌套在另一个内容控件内的 的父内容控件。

span.span: Gets the parent content control of a that is nested in another content control.

value.span: 嵌套了 的内容控件；如果 未嵌套在另一个内容控件中，则为 。

span.span: The content control in which the is nested; if the is not nested in another content control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和控件是可以包含嵌套的内容控件的内容控件的唯一类型。The and controls are the only types of content controls that can contain nested content controls.

summary.span: 获取在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前在 中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets the text that is displayed in the until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.

value.span: 在用户操作或某个其他操作更改文本之前，在控件中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed in the control until the text is changed by a user action or some other operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户编辑控件、 控件中填充数据的源的数据或者控件的内容被删除之前，会显示的占位符文本。The placeholder text is displayed until a user edits the control, the control is populated with data from a data source, or the control's contents are deleted. 若要设置占位符文本，请使用方法。To set the placeholder text, use the method.

summary.span: 获取一个 ，表示 的内容。

span.span: Gets a that represents the contents of the .

value.span: 的内容。

span.span: The contents of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息对象，请参阅[Word 对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see [Word Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/word-object-model-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCheckedSymbol (int CharacterNumber, string Font = "");
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetCheckedSymbol(int32 CharacterNumber, string Font) cil managed

param.name: CharacterNumber
param.span: 指定符号的 Unicode 字符数。

span.span: The Unicode character number for the specified symbol.

param.span: 此值将始终为 31（字体开始处的控件符号编号）与对应于该符号在符号表中的位置的数字（从左向右数）之和。

span.span: This value will always be the sum of 31 (the number of control symbols at the beginning of the font) and the number that corresponds to the position of the symbol in the table of symbols (counting from left to right).

param.span: 例如，要指定在 Symbol 字体中位于符号表中位置 37 处的增量字符，请将 CharacterNumber 设置为 68。

span.span: For example, to specify a delta character at position 37 in the table of symbols in the Symbol font, set CharacterNumber to 68.

param.name: Font
param.span: 包含符号的字体的名称。

span.span: The name of the font that contains the symbol.

summary.span: 设置用于表示 （代表复选框控件）的已选中状态的符号。

span.span: Sets the symbol used to represent the checked state of a that represents a check box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，仅当表示复选框内容控件。This property can be used only if the represents a check box content control. > [!NOTE] > 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.

exception.span: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

span.span: This property is used in a Word 2007 project.
The property does not have the value Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlCheckBox.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetPlaceholderText (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock BuildingBlock = null, Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range = null, string Text = "");

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetPlaceholderText(class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.BuildingBlock BuildingBlock, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, string Text) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the placeholder text.
A that contains the placeholder text.
The placeholder text.

summary.span: 将 、 或字符串中的文本显示为 中的占位符文本。

span.span: Displays text that is in a , a , or a string as the placeholder text in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户编辑控件、 控件中填充数据的源的数据或者控件的内容被删除之前，会显示的占位符文本。The placeholder text is displayed until a user edits the control, the control is populated with data from a data source, or the control's contents are deleted. 在调用时使用唯一的参数之一方法。Only one of the parameters is used when you call the method. 如果指定多个参数，则 Microsoft Office Word 将使用第一个指定的参数。If more than one parameter is specified, Microsoft Office Word uses the first specified parameter. 如果所有参数都被都省略，占位符文本是空字符串。If all parameters are omitted, the placeholder text is an empty string. 若要获取的占位符文本，使用属性。To get the placeholder text of a , use the property. 你还可以使用此属性将占位符文本设置为一个字符串。You can also use this property to set the placeholder text to a string.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetUncheckedSymbol (int CharacterNumber, string Font = "");
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetUncheckedSymbol(int32 CharacterNumber, string Font) cil managed

param.name: CharacterNumber
param.span: 指定符号的 Unicode 字符数。

span.span: The Unicode character number for the specified symbol.

param.span: 此值将始终为 31（字体开始处的控件符号编号）与对应于该符号在符号表中的位置的数字（从左向右数）之和。

span.span: This value will always be the sum of 31 (the number of control symbols at the beginning of the font) and the number that corresponds to the position of the symbol in the table of symbols (counting from left to right).

param.span: 例如，要指定在 Symbol 字体中位于符号表中位置 37 处的增量字符，请将 CharacterNumber 设置为 68。

span.span: For example, to specify a delta character at position 37 in the table of symbols in the Symbol font, set CharacterNumber to 68.

param.name: Font
param.span: 包含符号的字体的名称。

span.span: The name of the font that contains the symbol.

summary.span: 设置用于表示 （代表复选框控件）的未选中状态的符号

span.span: Sets the symbol used to represent the unchecked state of a that represents a check box control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，仅当表示复选框内容控件。This property can be used only if the represents a check box content control. > [!NOTE] > 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.

exception.span: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

span.span: This property is used in a Word 2007 project.
The property does not have the value Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlCheckBox.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定 当前是否显示占位符文本。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the is currently displaying placeholder text.

value.span: 如果 当前显示占位符文本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is currently displaying placeholder text; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的文本之前会显示的占位符文本由用户操作或一些其他操作更改。The placeholder text is displayed until the text in the is changed by a user action or some other operation. 若要获取或设置占位符文本，请使用属性或方法。To get or set the placeholder text, use the property or the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置要与 关联的字符串。

value.span: 一个要与 关联的字符串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来存储与关联的字符串文档处于打开状态时。You can use the property to store a string that is associated with the while the document is open. 若要查找由其标记的内容控件，使用方法。To find a content control by its tag, use the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在编辑 时是否自动将该控件从文档中删除。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the is automatically deleted from the document when the control is edited.

value.span: 如果要在编辑 时自动将该控件删除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is automatically deleted when the control is edited; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`、当用户在控件中，键入或以编程方式更改控件中的文本自动删除。If the property is `true`, the is automatically deleted when the user types in the control, or when the text in the control is changed programmatically. 当自动从文档，该控件将保持在文档中的文本中删除。When the is automatically deleted from the document, the text in the control remains in the document.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 所表示的内容控件的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the type of content control that the represents.

value.span: 所表示的内容控件的类型。

span.span: The type of content control that the represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性可以更改的 UI 和功能在运行时。You can use the property to change the UI and functionality of the at run time. 下表列出`Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType`值和控件的类型控制每个指定。The following table lists the `Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType` values and the type of control control that each specifies. 有关不同类型的内容控件的详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)。For more information about the different types of content controls, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md). |“值”Value|控件Control| |-----------|-------------| |`wdContentControlBuildingBlockGallery`|构建基块库。Building block gallery.| |`wdContentControlComboBox`|组合框。Combo box.| |`wdContentControlDate`|日期选取器。Date picker.| |`wdContentControlGroup`|GroupGroup| |`wdContentControlDropdownList`|下拉列表Drop-down list| |`wdContentControlPicture`|PicturePicture| |`wdContentControlRichText`|格式文本Rich text| |`wdContentControlText`|纯文本Plain text|

summary.span: 从文档中移除包含 的分组内容控件，以使该区域不再受保护。

span.span: Removes the group content control that contains the from the document so that the region is no longer protected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用来防止用户编辑文档的一部分。You can use a to prevent users from editing a part of a document. 如果嵌套在，你可以使用方法来删除父从文档。If a is nested in a , you can use the method to remove the parent from the document. 如果你这样做，请的所有项中包含的不再受保护。If you do this, all of the items that were in the are no longer protected. 有关如何使用若要保护的文档的某些部分，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[如何： 使用内容控件保护文档的某些部分](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md)。For more information about how to use a to protect parts of a document, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [How to: Protect Parts of Documents by Using Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-protect-parts-of-documents-by-using-content-controls.md).

span.span: The is not in a .

summary.span: 获取一个 ，表示 与自定义 XML 部件中元素之间的绑定。

span.span: Gets an that represents the binding between the and an element in a custom XML part.

value.span: 一个对象，表示 与自定义 XML 部件中元素之间的绑定。

span.span: An object that represents the binding between the and an element in a custom XML part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性将绑定到一种 XML 中的元素 (也名为*自定义 XML 部件*) 嵌入在文档中。Use the property to bind a to an element in a piece of XML (also named *custom XML part*) that is embedded in the document. 有关详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)和[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md)。For more information, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md) and [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md). 无法将构建基块库控件、 组控件和多格式文本控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件。You cannot bind building block gallery controls, group controls, and rich text controls to custom XML parts.

span.span: The property has the value Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlBuildingBlockGallery, Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlGroup or Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdContentControlType.wdContentControlRichText.
